bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Hello,
the cinnamon brightness manager doesn't work in my new upgrade to fedora 24.
I got to set brightness with writing /sys/class/backlight/intel_backlight/brightness. It is the only solution which work. The screen brightness is impossible to change since the applet or from the control center.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): Cinnamon 3.0.6
How reproducible: I don't know
Actual results: Brightness doesn't change when using applet or from control center or shortcut key (fn)
Expected results: adjust brightness from applet or shortcut or control center
Additional info:
here my hw conf: *-cpu description: CPU product: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU N3700 @ 1.60GHz vendor: Intel Corp. physical id: 2b bus info: cpu@0 version: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU N3700 @ 1.60GHz slot: SOCKET 0 size: 2400MHz capacity: 2400MHz width: 64 bits clock: 80MHz capabilities: x86-64 fpu fpu_exception wp vme de pse tsc msr pae mce cx8 apic sep mtrr pge mca cmov pat pse36 clflush dts acpi mmx fxsr sse sse2 ss ht tm pbe syscall nx rdtscp constant_tsc arch_perfmon pebs bts rep_good nopl xtopology nonstop_tsc aperfmperf eagerfpu pni pclmulqdq dtes64 monitor ds_cpl vmx est tm2 ssse3 cx16 xtpr pdcm sse4_1 sse4_2 movbe popcnt tsc_deadline_timer aes rdrand lahf_lm 3dnowprefetch epb tpr_shadow vnmi flexpriority ept vpid tsc_adjust smep erms dtherm ida arat cpufreq configuration: cores=4 enabledcores=4 threads=4 *-display description: VGA compatible controller product: Atom/Celeron/Pentium Processor x5-E8000/J3xxx/N3xxx Integrated Graphics Controller vendor: Intel Corporation physical id: 2 bus info: pci@0000:00:02.0 version: 21 width: 64 bits clock: 33MHz capabilities: pm msi vga_controller bus_master cap_list rom configuration: driver=i915 latency=0 resources: irq:121 memory:80000000-80ffffff memory:90000000-9fffffff ioport:f000(size=64) memory:c0000-dffff
I use redshift.
